questions.quote: Oh, the sex is wild but she's got this incredible toy collection and she won't let me near it!
George knows that you slept with Nina. That's why he was acting so weird.
I don't know her either.  She makes me fly all the way from Florida for this, and then she criticizes my jacket.
Hu, good, good,... well if he's calling in a month he's got a prayer!
So you don't take your coat off, and now everyone at NYU thinks I'm gay. Not that there's anything wrong with that...
You walk over that table, you pick up an eggroll, you don't say anything, you eat it, say 'thank you very much', wipe your mouth, walk away- I give you 50 bucks.
You know, like the general manager of a baseball team or something.
George, forget about the shoes. Want you to do something for me . This handicapped woman had an accident. Somebody gave her a used wheelchair with defective brakes.
